changeSet.author: k.ahmetchin
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists block ( id bigserial primary key, data varchar(512), prev_hash bytea, data_signature bytea, hash_signature bytea, next_id bigint, constraint fk_next_id foreign key (next_id) references block (id) on update restrict on delete restrict );

changeSet.author: k.ahmetchin
changeSet.sql: create table if not exists block_arbiter ( id bigserial primary key, data varchar(512), prev_hash bytea, data_signature bytea, hash_signature bytea, next_id bigint, timestamp varchar(128), arbiter_signature varchar(512), constraint fk_block_arbiter_next_id foreign key (next_id) references block_arbiter (id) on update restrict on delete restrict );
